126295.今日のルーレットはおしまい。\nまたね。: That's it for today's roulette. See ya.

126486.「ここは モンスターバトルロード\n 協力チャレンジバトル 受付さ！\n さて:
This is the Monster Battle Road Co-op
Challenge Battle Reception! So,
what do you wanna do?
<break>

126487.「協力チャレンジバトルに 参加するんだね。\n どっちにする？\n<break>:
Which battle do you wanna do?
<break>

126489.「今組んでいる パーティメンバーを誘って\n <%sL_BATTLE_PT>に:
Do you want to invite your current party
members to challenge <%sL_BATTLE_PT>?<yesno_2><close>

126490.「バトルを挑むために なかまを探すけど\n マッチングを おこなってもいいかな？:
I'm looking for a friend to challenge you to
a battle. Can I match you?<yesno_2><close>

126491.「おや まだキミは\n モンスターの登録が 済んでいないようだね。\n まずは:
Hey, you haven't registered a monster yet.
You'll need to register one at the Battle
Road desk.<end>

126492.「わた わた。\n おや？ キミは 誰だっけ？\n<br>\n「……ウソウソ。ち:
Hmm... Oh? Who are you again?
I see, I see... Now I remember. I found the perfect opponents to test against your strength!
I want you to fight 'em and show 'em what you're made of. Well? How about giving it a try?

127304.「おや どうやら登録されている\n モンスターのレベルが 足りないみたいだね。\:
Oh, looks like your registered monster's level
isn't high enough to participate. It needs to be
at least level <%dL_SANKA_LV>.
<bw_break>

127305.「おや どうやら登録されている\n モンスターの転生回数が 足りないみたいだね。:
Hmm, your registered monster doesn't have
enough reincarnations to participate. It needs
at least <%dL_SANKA_TENSEI> to be able to do so.
<bw_break>

127464.「他に 何か用は あるかな？\n<break>: Anything else I can do for you?<break>

127465.「おや やめておくんだね。\n 参加したくなったら\n また 声をかけてね。\n:
Oh, changed your mind? Give me a shout
anytime you'd like to join.
<end>

127466.「連戦チャレンジは その名前の通り\n ３連続で バトルにチャレンジしてもらうよ:
As the name suggests, you can challenge three battles in a row... There are three levels of difficulty, beginner, intermediate, and
advanced, so you can choose the level that suits you best and challenge...

127559.「どの説明を 聞くんだい？\n<break>: Which explanation do you want to hear?<break>

127560.「スペシャルバトルは\n 特別な相手と戦う 夢のバトルだよ！\n どんなモンスタ:
Special battles are the battles of your dreams against special opponents! Aren't you excited to see what kind of monsters they'll
be? These are some of the toughest battles you'll ever face, so make sure you're ready for anything! We'll be adding more battles
every day!

127665.「連戦チャレンジは その名の通り\n ３連続で バトルに チャレンジしてもらうよ:
As the name suggests, you can challenge
yourself to three battles in a row... Choose
your difficulty level from this list!<break>

127666.「スペシャルバトルは\n 特別な相手と戦う 夢のバトルだよ！\n どんなモンスタ:
Special battles are the battles of your dreams against special opponents! Aren't you excited to see what kind of monsters they'll
be? These are some of the toughest battles you'll ever face, so make sure you're ready for anything! We'll be adding one new battle
every day!

127997.「ごめんね。\n 今はバトルを 開催していないよ。: Sorry, there isn't a battle being held now.

128022.「おや このバトルには\n まだ参加することが できないよ。:
Hey, you can't participate in this battle
just yet.

128058.「わた わた。\n ウーン。おなかすいたなぁ。\n<br>\n「……おや？\n:
Wa... I'm so hungry...
...Oh? You seem to understand the language of monsters.
My name is Fluffy. I came from a place called the Kingdom of GreatTree to look for a certain Monster Master.
But I accidentally got lost. Before I knew it, I found myself here. Hmm, I wish I could eat some meat.
............
I can feel your strong power. Could it be that you are the Monster Master I'm looking for?
............
It's decided. I think I'll just relax here for a while. I'm curious to see what you can do.
If you don't mind, I'll use my power to prepare an opponent, and I'd like you to put your skills to the test.
But it will take some time to prepare, so please come see me again in a little while.

128059.「わた わた。\n ウーン。おなかすいたなぁ。\n<br>\n「……おや？\n:
Wa wa. Hmm. I'm so Hungry
...Oh? You seem to understand the language of monsters.
My name is Fluffy. I came from a place called the Kingdom of GreatTree to look for a certain Monster Master.
But I accidentally got lost. Before I knew it, I found myself here. Hmm, I wish I could eat some meat.
............
I can feel your strong power. Could it be that you are the Monster Master I'm looking for?
I'm going to stay here for a while to test your skills as a Monster Master. I'm doing preparations for it now.
Come see me again if you like. When you do, I want you to show me what you can do as a Monster Master.

128060.「わた わた。\n ウーン。おなかすいたなぁ。\n<br>\n「……おや？\n:
Wa wa. Hmm. I'm so Hungry
...Oh? You seem to understand the language of monsters.
My name is Fluffy. I came from a place called the Kingdom of GreatTree to look for a certain Monster Master.
But I accidentally got lost. Before I knew it, I found myself here. Hmm, I wish I could eat some meat.
............
I can feel your strong power. Could it be that you are the Monster Master I'm looking for?
............
It's decided. I think I'll just relax here for a while. I'm curious to see what you can do.
If you don't mind, I'll use my power to prepare an opponent, and I'd like you to put your skills to the test.
I'd like you to fight them and show me what you can do. How about it? Want to give it a try?

128061.「ウーン 残念。\n ボクは しばらく ココにいるから\n 気が変わったら また:
Um... I'll be here for a while, so if you
change your mind, I'll call you.<end>

128062.「よかった！\n ますます キミに興味が わいてきたよ！\n<br>\n「でも:
I'm glad to hear that! I'm starting to take more of an interest in you!
But I gotta explain some things to you first, so listen closely.
This time, I've changed things up a bit by preparing a party alliance battle where eight people fight together.
The number of opponents you can face will go up every day. I'm excited to see who else you'll be able to fight!
These battles also won't use up any of your Battle Road tries, so feel free to battle as many times as you want!
During battle, you'll control whatever monster is set as your leader. Be sure to check its equipment and badges beforehand.
However, you can't fight these battles alone. So, I'll help you out and find some other Monster Masters to fight alongside you!
And of course, you can battle with anyone you've created a party with!
Last, but not least, helping someone clear a battle for the first time might earn you a little something extra!
Please note that some of these battles contain spoilers for Version 4. We appreciate your understanding. And that's all for the explanation. So, without further ado...

128063.「わた わた。\n まだ準備中だから お肉でも食べて 待っててね。\n<end>:
I'm sorry. It's still being prepared, so have
some meat and wait...<end>

128064.「わた わた。\n ウーン。おなかすいたなぁ。\n 近くのお店にあった お肉 食:
Waa, I'm starving... can you get me some meat from the store nearby?
The next test of your skills is being prepared now. Please wait until it's ready.

129069.「おや キミは\n パーティリーダーでは ないみたいだね。\n リーダーの人から:
Hey, you're not the party leader. Have
whoever's leader talk to me.

130617.「わた わた。\n やっぱり 挑戦したくなったかな？\n<yesno><brea:
Ah...
I knew it. You wanna try?
<yesno><break>

130618.「協力チャレンジバトルに 参加するモンスターは\n すでに ここの受付に登録され:
The monster that'll participate in the Co-op Challenge will be your leader monster that's already been registered at the desk.
However, the monster needs to be at least level 45 and have been reincarnated at least 3 times.
If you want to change the monster that's participating, go talk to Receptionist Beata.

130619.<color_yellow>\n協力チャレンジバトルへの参加は レベル<%nL_:
<color_yellow>
To participate in the Co-op Battles, you
need to be at least level <%dL_SANKA_LV> and reincarnated
at least <%dL_SANKA_TENSEI> times. Monsters can be changed
by talking to Receptionist Beata.

130690.「おや？ キミは\n 現在ペナルティ中 みたいだね。\n あと<%nC_PENA:
Hmm? You're currently under penalty... You
can't participate in battles for another
<%dC_PENALTY> minutes.
